Reviews.Title: “Great Stay”
Reviews.Author: gosox35805
Reviews.Content: Great Place to Stay.Room was clean and quiet.Breakfast included eggs, bacon and sausage. Staff was very helpful. Nothing but good things to say about my stay.

Reviews.Title: “Good in all aspects”
Reviews.Author: quintenhig
Reviews.Content: On a recent trip to Phoenix, I stayed the night here. The service was OUTSTANDING!!! Super friendly and had knowledge of the surrounding businesses. The room was very clean and comfortable. The front desk even knew of the specials at Chili's right down the street. It was a little pricey for my taste ($120.00) but it was well worth it. I'd definately stop in again during my next trip.

Reviews.Title: “Clean, quiet and excellent value!!!”
Reviews.Author: Pat K
Reviews.Content: We stayed two nights in this clean comfortable hotel. The breakfast was great and people friendly. We really enjoyed the fact the the beds were very comfortable and the hotel was quiet. We were able to get a good night sleep and really enjoy the many fun things to do nearby.

Reviews.Title: “Clean and comfortable in a nice location”
Reviews.Author: Sled_Runner64
Reviews.Content: We stayed one night at this hotel on our way to Sedona. It is a clean place conveniently located just off I-17 and, compared to nearby hotels, very reasonable. We paid $130 (including tax) for a two-room suite and the price included a nice breakfast. The gentlemen who checked us in was very pleasant and offered a variety of suggestions as to where we could get something to eat nearby. The lobby and dining area were attractive and the only complaint is that our room had an "off" smell. Not sure why, but it was otherwise clean. We ended up with a room on the noisy freeway side in spite of the fact that I'd requested one on the other side, but the curtains darkened the room sufficiently and the bed was so comfy that it wasn't too much of an issue.

Reviews.Title: “Good stay for business travel”
Reviews.Author: WheelingTraveler
Reviews.Content: I was there for three nights due to business. The one-queen bed room was clean with microwave and refrigerator. Nice free breakfast with typical hot and cold items. My room was on the freeway side and there was occasional noise at night due to traffic. Ask for the rooms on the opposite side if available.

Reviews.Title: “Very Good Price”
Reviews.Author: halleybopp
Reviews.Content: Stayed here for business, and the room was only $67 a night. Made the boss happy. Plus, accomodations were decent. Across the freeway there is a Target, and several good chain restaurants, like Chili's. Convenient location in Phoenix, right on the i-17.

Reviews.Title: “Solid Stay for My Trip. Very Happy”
Reviews.Author: AwakenTampa
Reviews.Content: I really enjoyed my stay. Lots of positives for staying here and I would easily stay here again. Pros: Easy access to 2 major Hwys (17 and the 101 loop) Good Included Breakfast Large Rooms Large Soft Bed Free Internet Included Lots of Restaurant and Food Choices near Nice Staff Fridge and Microwave in Room LCD TV in Room Cons: Slow Internet The stay was really nice. It is near a highway, so I can't speak for noise on that side of the building as I stayed on the rear side and it was quiet. I forgot my toothpaste and was given a small set for free which was super nice. The breakfast spread was pretty good and almost anyone could find something that could work for them. The only thing that was annoying was the internet speed. It was crawling which made doing anything serious from the room impossible. Nonetheless, I still would easily stay here again and recommend it to others. Hopefully they will get the internet speed up a little bit.

Reviews.Title: “Pleasantly Surprised Delightful room staff that made you feel like family.”
Reviews.Author: bonbrant
Reviews.Content: Needed a getaway weekend. Liked the idea of a suite with spa...the front desk was awsome. Breakfast was worth waking up for....will stay again....the lobby was inviting

Reviews.Title: “Comforts of home without the every day aggravations!”
Reviews.Author: BigKat56
Reviews.Content: My husband and I stayed for a week. We were in town for the combination of celebrating our thirty-first wedding anniversary and visiting relatives. The pictures that are featured online are true to life as to what to expect of the accomadations. In all my years of traveling, I have never experienced such immaculate rooms, bathrooms (including the first floor for guest), the breakfast room, pool area, hallways and the grounds surrounding the hotel (including the parking lots). I never witnessed trash, ash trays or the smell of cigarettes. It was sheer pleasure staying at this hotel. The extended continental breakfast was more than fulfilling, it was down right wholesome, right down to the creamy oatmeal with brown sugar that I enjoyed every morning as I do at home. The hotel staff made us feel welcomed from the very beginning and during the duration of our stay. I truly enjoyed talking with Ms. Judy my last night at the hotel, we talked as if we knew each other from another time. The only problem we had was our refrigerator didn't work well but room service sent someone within minutes of our call for repairs. We were told if the refigerator couldn't be repaired we would be given another room. Overall the accomadations were outstanding. I plan to look for more Country Inn & Suites in my future travels. All others have a hard act to follow.

Reviews.Title: “Nice place to stay”
Reviews.Author: Sapawlowicz
Reviews.Content: We needed a hotel for 2 nights after our house flooded. We have stayed at other Country Inn and Suites across the US and this one didn't dissapoint! We were greeted rather quickly and the kids were offered cookies while I checked us in. We got a King Suite which was rather large and the furniture in the living room looked brand new. Our bathroom was very clean and actually had enough towels for all 4 of us. Breakfast was a favorite amongst the children, and it had a very large variety (waffles, eggs, sausage, cereals, yogurt, assorted pastries and more!). My husband and son enjoyed the pool and spa as well. The hotel was not crowded and fairly quiet.

Reviews.Title: “Hotel to recommend”
Reviews.Author: kukuBerne
Reviews.Content: Huge and clean rooms with nice complimentary breakfast. OK, far from center of town and need a car. If not, the complimentary hotel shuttle will bring you anywhere in a radius of 5 miles, shopping centers, movie theatres, restaurants, car rentals, etc. And with Bill, it's driver, you will be served like a VIP !

Reviews.Title: “Best Country Inns and Suites we have stayed in!”
Reviews.Author: carolwen
Reviews.Content: We stayed here May 22 for three nights visiting our grandson who attends the Motorcycle Mechanics Institute. It was convenient to the school, restaurants, his apartment and shopping. This hotel was spotless. Great breakfast and also snacks in the evening. The landscaping was beautiful. Pool and hot tub spotless. Great business center in the lobby. Fresh cookies in the evening. This was our favorite Country Inns and Suites ever! Staff was friendly and excellent! Room was a suite and very comfortable. I am looking forward to visiting here again!

Reviews.Title: “I will never go there again after they stole my money”
Reviews.Author: miasmama8023
Reviews.Content: I prepaid everything through Expedia.com. The day I checked out the hotel charged me again. This resulted in almost $500 in overdraft fees. I spoke to a lady named Terri who at first was very helpful. She said the money would be put back on my card that day. That was 4 days ago and I still have not recieved it. I asked her about the fees that resulted and she said they were not resposible for those. Not responsible??? They basically stole my money and they aren't responsible? I will never go there again. There are plenty of hotels in Phoenix I will go to instead of these scammers.

Reviews.Title: “Clean hotel with friendly staff”
Reviews.Author: sc80
Reviews.Content: I've stayed at this Coutnry Inn a few times over the past year and half while visiting Phoenix on businees. The experience has been consistently good each time. Nearly all of the staff is the same since my first visit. Pros: - clean rooms - free breakfast buffet (more food choices than most hotels) - free shuttle service - good staff (front desk, drivers and housekeeping) - high speed (wired) internet in every room - pool and hot tub w/ complimentary towels - good value if you consider that breakfast is included - close to highway - free cookies Cons - fitness room is small (if all you need is a cardio machine, bench and free weights it is fine) - decor looks a bit dated - not much within walking distance (luckily they have free shuttle service)

Reviews.Title: “Great price value”
Reviews.Author: ArizonaCH
Reviews.Content: This was the best price value of my entire trip. A room with approx. 500 square feet, a separate entree, a king size bed, a small kitchen, full bath for USD 53/night incl. breakfast. Well connected to highway 101. Free wireless LAN.

Reviews.Title: “GREAT HOTEL”
Reviews.Author: frj22
Reviews.Content: I have stayed at the Country Inn and Suites about eight times a month for the last eight months. I have been traveling to Phoenix on business for the last 15 years and the Couyntry Inn is one of the best places to stay without spending $200+ a night. The rooms are clean and the facility is weel maintained. They recently painted and replaced the furniture and carpet in he rooms where I stay, although the old decor was far from shabby. Nice pool abd the staff is friendly and accomodating. I plan to continue staying here in the future. Frank, Seattle, WA

Reviews.Title: “Great Find”
Reviews.Author: GmaJody
Reviews.Content: Was in Phoenix on business and this hotel was close to the office I was working at. Decided to give it a try and am so glad I did. Hotel was clean and comfortable and the staff was very friendly and helpful. Breakfast was your average free breakfast with nice selection of pastries, waffels, and cold cereal. There is a small pool with a very nice patio area to relax. It is a little difficult to get to (it's on a frontage road next to the freeway) but once you figuare it out it is a great location. Plenty of food choices nearby with shopping and entertainment also available. This was my second stay at a Country Suites and have been happy both times.

Reviews.Title: “Great Place to Stay”
Reviews.Author: alpha1145
Reviews.Content: I stayed there while on business in Phoenix. The area is really nice and there is a shopping center with a 30 screen movie theater nearby. There are many places to eat. The hotel was really nice and very clean. The breakfast offered was great with many choices (french toast, yogurt, bagels, juice, etc). Much better food than other places I've stayed. It was a little hard to find in the dark, so make sure you do your homework before you try and find it. The internet was a little on the slow side compared to my home comcast connection, but it worked for surfing pages. I would stay there again. I was there 3/26/07-3/29/07.

Reviews.Title: “Beware of the security of your credit card information”
Reviews.Author: Jeanie W
Reviews.Content: The owners of this property also own a Hilton Garden Inn in Avondale. We had a reservation at the Hilton that we cancelled in writing as the hotel was months behind in opening and not responsive or able to ensure that we would have a place to stay when we arrived. Apparently, this property took it upon itself, without our permission or knowledge to use our info from the Hilton Garden Inn to book a reservation at their hotel. When I responded to their confirmation and requested that it be cancelled, I was met with silence. I can understand a delay in opening, but why this property would choose to violate my privacy as well as their merchant agreement with American Express is beyond me. Why would they presume that it was reasonable for us to stay over 20 miles away from where we needed to be? 72 hours before a two week business trip, I had to place a fraud alert on my Amex to protect myself. If there was a plan B for those of us with reservations, some clear communication would have resolved this entire issue. Instead, I received an email from the Country Inn threatening me with a penalty if I do not cancel my reservation 24 hours before I arrive. What if I had already left home and did not see the email in time? When I called the Country Inn and Suites toll free number, the agent indicated that she would begin an investigation - I can only hope so.

Reviews.Title: “Nice place to stay”
Reviews.Author: IllinoisTraveller
Reviews.Content: We stayed at the Country Inn at the north end of Phoenix/Scottsdale. It's a clean, quiet place near shopping and the highway. It was a little difficult to find, even with the directions given. It faces an east/west freeway (I guess they call them that out there) on a one-way frontage road. Once we figured out it must be on the frontage road, we were fine. Breakfasts were decent. The room and beds were comfortable. I'd stay at this one again and will definitely give a try to other Country Inn & Suites hotels elsewhere.

Reviews.Title: “Very Nice Hotel”
Reviews.Author: JohnDoughBaytown_TX
Reviews.Content: It was a little more than I had intended to pay, but the room was very nice. The employees were very helpful and the breakfast was good. I would definetly stay there again. It can be a little tricky getting in and out of the hotel because it is at the intersection of 2 freeways, so you have to take the backroads, but once you learn it it is easy.

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful accommodations, no transportation worries.”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: All services promised on the phone or listed on the internet were absolutely accurate. Very hospitable staff willing to assure all comforts of guests. Pleasant and comfortable rooms. Inviting fireplace in lobby. Pool and exercise room open 24 hours. Substantial breakfast included in reasonable room rate. Free shuttle to and from airport and the ski equipment rental site. Shuttle service provided to all ski areas or to the ski buses at very reasonable rates. No worry about having to do own driving on mountain roads. If desired however, rental car can be arranged at motel. Personable and considerate staff and manager. You will want to return for subsequent visits.

HotelInfo.Name: Country Inn & Suites Deer Valley
HotelInfo.Address: 20221 North 29th Avenue, Phoenix, AZ 85027
